forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
The day unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, where a crisp, mostly sunny canvas stretches above, wrapping the city in a gentle embrace. As the hours advance, a serene warmth creeps in, but everything remains tinged with the familiar coolness of the Bay air, a high simmering around 65 degrees. Though the forecast hints at a decline to 60 by afternoon, the spirited northwest breeze plays softly through the streets, making the charm of an urban stroll all the more inviting. 

Tonight, the sky will shift toward partially cloaking the stars, embodying the tranquil spirit of the evening with temperatures layered around 50 degrees. Fog drifts as a whisper over the coastline, barely touching the town, leaving the Golden Gate shimmering under a soft embrace, while the marine layer dances further away, caressing the gentle undulation of the bay. For those venturing out, a light jacket will serve as a faithful companion against the evening's embrace, becoming a cocoon rather than a burden. With a day so promising, consider wandering along a less-traveled path, perhaps pausing at a neighborhood café to savor a warm drink or exploring a local gallery, lost in the hues of creativity amidst a city alive with allure.
